Articles.Content: please make it so you can earn full game parts.if you get to orbit, you get a few parts. then the mun, more parts. mimbus more parts so on. if you can get to a sertan spot on the duna surface.

Welcome aboard!

The demo is meant to give the player a taste of the game without giving the full experience, other planets and the full part list would run a bit counter to that.

What you're suggesting is how science mode works.

Demo is demo, something has to be limited. In Kerbal case, part count, you're not limited to Kerbin system only, you still can make interplanetary trips with parts you get in demo (it's harder though)

Also, sorry: 

8 hours ago, neoshaf said:

mimbus

?

3 hours ago, The Aziz said:

Demo is demo, something has to be limited. In Kerbal case, part count, you're not limited to Kerbin system only, you still can make interplanetary trips with parts you get in demo (it's harder though)

I haven't played the demo in a while, previously it didn't have any celestial bodies other than Kerbin, Mun, Minmus and the sun. Are the other planets there now?
Wait, my mistake, I just read full description on wiki, and demo seems to be more limited than I thought, and indeed there is only sun, Kerbin and its moons.
